name: David Bowies quest against the red cubes
name_original: David Bowies quest against the red cubes
description: This is a game I programmed for my Game 135 course at Azusa Pacific University, it was to create a space shooter game in where enemies attack the player character. You as David Bowie are sent to fire his laser beams to block off the giant red cubes that have been sent to destroy Ziggy stardust.
